org.symphonyoss.client.services

Class ConnectionsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.client.services.ConnectionsService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionsEventListener, ConnectionsListener

    public class ConnectionsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionsListener, ConnectionsEventListener
    This service handles incoming connection requests and provides options for automatically accepting requests.

    All actions for connection requests should be handled through ConnectionsClient

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionNotification

        public void onConnectionNotification(SymUserConnection userConnection)
        New connection request notification message from callback. Issue event to all registered listeners.

        Option to auto-accept on new event.

        Specified by:
        onConnectionNotification in interface ConnectionsListener
        Parameters:
        userConnection - User connection detail
